# copy-wrap



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Usage

### Default

<copy-wrap>
	<h1>Heading</h1>
	<h2>Heading</h2>
	<h3>Heading</h3>
	<h4>Heading</h4>
	<h5>Heading</h5>
	<h6>Heading</h6>
	<p>Paragraph</p>
</copy-wrap>



## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description | Type      | Default  |
| -------- | --------- | ----------- | --------- | -------- |
| `align`  | `align`   |             | `string`  | `"left"` |
| `full`   | `full`    |             | `boolean` | `false`  |
